name: Lion Cubs Kids Zoo Games
description:
Looking after kittens at our wild cat school is not easy at all. Give it a try. Hello children and welcome to the Kids Zoo Games series. The unruly kittens will not let you rest. They love to escape their basket! Make sure the kittens don’t run away and always give the right one to the right mother.

• Very attractive and funny action game for kids.
• A school with a lion, tiger, cheetah, panther and lynx cub.
• Become a teacher in our school for young wild animals.
• Watch out for the eagle who could snatch the kittens away!
• For children over 3; fun for the whole family.
• Limited ads.
• The game is free!
